TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit VersionNotFoundException extends System.Data.DataException

Docs.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when you try to return a version of a that has been deleted.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> and ten <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects. After deleting a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, trying to return the removed row's current version causes a VersionNotFoundException exception being thrown.
[!code-vb[Classic WebData VersionNotFoundException Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.data.versionnot_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData VersionNotFoundException Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.versionnot_1.cs)]

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
